item.description:
Ok this one is just too weird for me to pass up.   A Teddy Bear comes to life and hangs out with Mark Wahlberg...huh?  A fantasy...but not the nice warm fuzzy Disney kind.   Created by the guy who does Family Guy, so you know it will be funny!

Showtime is 6:30 PM.  I will be at the theater before 6 and we will head in for seats around 6:15.  Since the movie has been out for a while, I don't think we need as much time before to find seats together.

The movie is showing upstairs, so look for me at the tables by the windows at the top of the escalator.  I will be wearing a meetup pin.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after. We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in, to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after and bring cash.

Movie Details:

Release Date: July 13, 2012
Studio: Universal Pictures
Director: Seth MacFarlane
Screenwriter: Seth MacFarlane, Alec Sulkin, Wellesley Wild
Starring: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Giovanni Ribisi, Joel McHale, Seth MacFarlane, Patrick Warburton, Jessica Stroup, Laura Vandervoort
Genre: Live Action/CG-Animated Comedy
MPAA Rating: R (for crude and sexual content, pervasive language, and some drug use)
Official Website: TedisReal.com

Plot Summary: "Family Guy" creator Seth MacFarlane brings his boundary-pushing brand of humor to the big screen for the first time as writer, director and voice star of "Ted." In the live action/CG-animated comedy, he tells the story of John Bennett (Mark Wahlberg), a grown man who must deal with the cherished teddy bear who came to life as the result of a childhood wish... and has refused to leave his side ever since.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Ted (6:30PM Show)
